title: An interactive tool to explore the <1>Sustainable Development Goals</1> in <4>Gal√°pagos</4>
subtitle: 40 targets from the UN Sustainable Development Goals were prioritised and adapted in participatory workshops in 2021, and the interactions between them were analysed. This network shows the results of those workshops and provides an interactive way to explore these priorities and their synergies.
